welcome_message_body: Welcome to Thompson, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community! We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sullivan County International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Sullivan County International Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orange County Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying in on a private jet, the private jet terminal provides a luxurious and convenient experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
